titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the banellas imported from the Indies shewing their wonderful virtues in curing melancholly and distraction / written by a physitian in the countrey to Dr. Allen, one of the Royal Society at London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
